## Description {#details}

Placeholder metadata for operands of distinct MDNodes.

This is a lightweight placeholder for an operand of a distinct node. It&#39;s purpose is to help track forward references when creating a distinct node. This allows distinct nodes involved in a cycle to be constructed before their operands without requiring a heavyweight temporary node with full-blown RAUW support.

Each placeholder supports only a single <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mdnode">MDNode</a> user. Clients should pass an <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#abdf8cf606905c10634e831390981b0ed">ID</a>, retrieved via <em><a href="#a629021baa296713fdc2ab0c208904d16">getID()</a></em>, to indicate the &quot;real&quot; operand that this should be replaced with.

While it would be possible to implement move operators, they would be fairly expensive. Leave them unimplemented to discourage their use (clients can use std::deque, std::list, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a8e612822d4ba7bb36c9c79582a567108">BumpPtrAllocator</a>, etc.).

Definition at line 1692 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/metadata-h">Metadata.h</a>.
